author: markt
msg: - Stack traces are now escaped to ensure correct display.

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 10656. If session-timeout is zero or less, session should not timeout.

author: markt
msg: - The word 'notice' is incorrectly repeated in condition 1. It appears once at the end of the first line and is immediately repeated at the start of the second. This patch removes the repeated word.

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 10372. Prevent NPE if container is null
